profile.profileDescription: Custom profile configuration for BAM Collections.

label.name: Getty Union List of Artist Names
Library of Congress subject headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Dates
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

label.name: Dates
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Length
label.description: Length of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Weight
label.description: Weight of object; enter in your preferred units

settings.setting: <ifdef code="dimensions_height">^dimensions_height~units:in</ifdef><ifdef code="dimensions_length"> x </ifdef><ifdef code="dimensions_length">^dimensions_length~units:in</ifdef><ifdef code="dimensions_width"> x </ifdef><ifdef code="dimensions_width">^dimensions_width~units:in</ifdef><ifdef code="dimensions_height"> (</ifdef><ifdef code="dimensions_height">^dimensions_height~units:cm</ifdef><ifdef code="dimensions_length"> x </ifdef><ifdef code="dimensions_length">^dimensions_length~units:cm</ifdef><ifdef code="dimensions_width"> x </ifdef><ifdef code="dimensions_width">^dimensions_width~units:cm</ifdef><ifdef code="dimensions_height">)</ifdef>

label.name: Description
label.description: An account of the resource. Description may include but is not limited to: an abstract, a table of contents, a graphical representation, or a free-text account of the resource.

label.name: Internal Notes
label.description: An account of the resource. Description may include but is not limited to: an abstract, a table of contents, a graphical representation, or a free-text account of the resource.

label.name: Year Acquired
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

label.name: Internal Notes
label.description: Notes regarding item

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Geographic Notes
label.description: Geographic notes regarding item

label.name: Inscription
label.description: A description or transcription of any distinguishing or identifying physical lettering, annotations, texts, markings, or labels that are affixed, applied, stamped, written, inscribed, or attached to the work, excluding any mark or text inherent in the materials of which the work is made (record watermarks in Display Materials/Techniques).

label.name: Rights
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.name: Rights holder
label.description: To identify the person or organisation holding or managing the rights related to the resource.

label.name: Rights
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.name: Rights holder
label.description: To identify the person or organisation holding or managing the rights related to the resource.

label.name: Quantity
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Vital dates
label.description: A description of the lifespan of the person or the existence of the corporate body, using ca. and any other expressions of uncertainty or nuance. For Birth and Death date attributes, record years of birth and death, estimated where necessary. For a corporate body, use birthdate and deathdate to record the dates of founding and dissolution.

label.name: Authorization date
label.description: The date when the loan was authorized.

label.name: Loan in date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Loan out date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Loan return date
label.description: The date a loan is due back to the lending institution.

label.name: Loan conditions
label.description: A statement of the conditions on a loan.

label.name: Loan notes
label.description: General information about the loan.

label.name: Loan purpose
label.description: General information about the purpose of loan.

label.name: Loan Type
label.description: General information about the purpose of loan.

label.name: Sale Dates
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.
